data.title: 80 Powerful Karma Quotes on Love, Life, and Revenge
data.meta_description: There is always room to become a better person, right? So let’s read some powerful karma quotes and get all the inspiration we need to live a truthful life.
data.text:
You must have heard of the saying — what goes around comes around.

Well, that is karma for you.

It has always been said that whatever you give out to the universe, you get back the same. If you give good vibes and intentions, you will get back the same. However, if you give bad vibes, you will get that.

Maybe that is why it is said, whatever you do, do it with good intentions, as what you give, you get back. Right?

So let’s read some karma quotes and get all the inspiration we need to live a truthful life.

Lead a life of complete positivity and spirituality by connecting with professional experts for free.

Karma Quotes

There is always room to become a better person. The universe sees it all and if you really want some motivation, here are some karma quotes for you –

The law is simple. Every experience is repeated or suffered till you experience it properly and fully the first time. ― Ben Okri

Every moment of your life and everything happening around you is the result of some past karma. – Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

Plant seeds of happiness, hope, success, and love; it will all come back to you in abundance. This is the law of nature. – Steve Maraboli

Sooner or later, everyone sits down to a banquet of consequences. – Robert Louis Stevenson

The more love you give away, the more love you will receive. – Unknown

Karma is the universe's way of balancing things out. If you put good out, you get good back. If you put bad out, well, you know what's coming. – Unknown

The universe does not carry debts. It always returns back to you what you gave it. ― Drishti Bablani

There are the waves, and there is the wind, seen and unseen forces. Everyone has these same elements in their lives, the seen and unseen, karma, and free will. – Kuan Yin

Every action of our lives touches on some chord that will vibrate in eternity. – Edwin Hubbell Chapin The meaning of karma is in the intention. The intention behind action is what matters. – The Bhagavad Gita

Short Karma Quotes

Get a quick glance at why one should always think before speaking or reacting. Here are some short karma quotes for you to live a good and honest life.

Realize that everything connects to everything else. – Leonardo da Vinci

How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours. – Wayne Dyer

By each crime and every kindness, we birth our future. – David Mitchell

Karma has no menu. You get served what you deserve. – Unknown

If karma doesn’t catch up, God will surely pick up the slack. – Anthony Liccione

Karma, simply put, is an action for an action, good or bad. – Stephen Richards

Strange things conspire when one tries to cheat fate. ― Rick Riordan

Conscious action does not produce karma - reaction does. – Sadhguru

Your beliefs don't make you a better person, your behaviour does. – Sukhraj S. Dhillon

You are free to choose, but you are not free from the consequences of your choice. – Unknown

Karma Says Quotes

You must have come across the “karma says quotes,” which inspire and motivate you to look within yourself and become a true version of yourself. Here are some of those quotes for you.

You reap what you sow: Life is like a boomerang. Our thoughts, deeds and words return to us sooner or later, with astounding accuracy. – Grant M. Bright.

You cannot do harm to someone because someone has done harm to you. You will pay just like they will. – Ericka Williams

Your states of mind do not occur randomly. They occur because of vibratory and karmic patterns. – Frederick Lenz

Your believing or not believing in karma has no effect on its existence, nor on its consequences to you. Just as a refusal to believe in the ocean would not prevent you from drowning. – F. Paul Wilson

There is a wonderful mythical law of nature that the three things we crave most in life – happiness, freedom, and peace of mind-are always attained by giving them to someone else. – Peyton Conway March

Karma moves in two directions. If we act virtuously, the seed we plant will result in happiness. If we act non-virtuously, suffering results. – Sakyong Mipham

People pay for what they do, and still more, for what they have allowed themselves to become. And they pay for it simply: by the lives they lead. – Edith Wharton

Each individual is solely responsible for his or her own actions, and every action will produce a reaction equal in every way to the suit of the action. – Stephen Arroyo

My actions are my only true belongings. I cannot escape the consequences of my actions. My actions are the ground upon which I stand. – Thich Nhat Hanh

Old layers of karma can stick to you only if you keep adding new layers of karmic glue. – Sadhguru

Life Inspirational Karma Quotes

When it comes to karma, it inspires you to do good and be good in life. We all lose our way when trying to understand how things work in life. Here are some life inspirational karma quotes for you to get by.

Even chance meetings are the result of karma. Things in life are fated by our previous lives. That even in the smallest events there’s no such thing as coincidence. – Haruki Murakami

When you see faults in others, you bind karma and when you see your own faults, you are released from karmas. – Dada Bhagwan

Life will give you whatever experience is most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness. Because this is the experience you are having at the moment. – Eckhart Tolle

As she has planted, so does she harvest; such is the field of karma. – Sri Guru Granth Sahib

To go from mortal to Buddha, you have to put an end to karma, nurture your awareness, and accept what life brings. – Bodhidharma

Karma, when properly understood, is just the mechanics through which consciousness manifests. – Deepak Chopra

For the keynote of the law of Karma is equilibrium, and nature is always working to restore that equilibrium whenever through man's acts it is disturbed. – Christmas Humphreys

This is your karma. You do not understand now, but you will understand later. The source of pain is within your own larger expression of being. – H. Raven Rose

Sometimes you have to suffer in life, not because you were bad, but because you didn't realize where and when to stop being good. – Jordan Hoechlin

Every act is done, no matter how insignificant, will eventually return to the doer with equal impact. Good will be returned with good; evil with evil. – Nishan Panwar

If you need more than karma quotes to understand the power of the universe and how it is all connected with your mind, body, and soul, talk to renowned experts for free.

Love Karma Quotes

When it comes to love, karma plays a huge role in who you get and who you deserve. It is all about manifestations and your intentions. Let’s see some love karma quotes and how they impact our lives.

Most times, how you treat your children is how they grow up to treat you. – Terry Mark

When someone has a strong intuitive connection, Buddhism suggests that it’s because of karma, some past connection. – Richard Gere

Even chance meetings … are the result of karma. …things in life are fated by our previous lives. That even in the smallest events there’s no such thing as coincidence. – Haruki Murakami

When the karma of a relationship is done, only love remains. Let go. It’s safe. – Elizabeth Gilbert

The love you send into the world, you will find, is the love that returns to you. – Avina Celeste

Karma is nothing more than a reminder that we are ONE. Harming others we ultimately end up harming ourselves. – Gordana Biernat

Men are not punished for their sins but by them. – Kin Hubbard

Often when someone hurts you, they aren’t hurting you because you are you. They are hurting you because they are them. – Karen Salmansohn

Stop blaming others for the pains and sufferings you have. They are because of you, your karma, and your own disposition. ― Girdhar Joshi

You will never understand the damage you did to another person until the same is done to you. – Anonymous

Revenge Karma Quotes

Karma is the best revenge one cannot possibly escape from. So let us look at some revenge karma quotes and see how exactly the universe works for everyone.

Karma is a tricky thing. To serve karma, one must repay good karma to others. To serve karma well, one must sometimes deliver bad karma where it is due. – M.R. Mathias

Call it fate, call it luck, call it karma. I believe everything happens for a reason. – Ghostbusters

Karma is like a rubber band. You can only stretch it so far before it comes back and smacks you in the face. – Unknown

Violence does, in truth, recoil upon the violent, and the schemer falls into the pit which he digs for another. – Arthur Conan Doyle

When you truly understand karma, then you realize you are responsible for everything in your life. – Keanu Reeves

You get treated in life the way you teach people to treat you. — Wayne W. Dyer

Karma is not something complicated or philosophical. Karma means watching your body, watching your mouth, and watching your mind. Trying to keep these three doors as pure as possible is the practice of karma. – Thubten Yeshe

The liar’s punishment is not in the least that he is not believed, but that he cannot believe anyone else. – George Bernard Shaw

When we judge, we create negative karma. When we say of an action: ‘This is right,’ or, ‘That is wrong,’ we create negative karma. — Gary Zukav

See karma, make dharma. — Gary Gach

Buddha Quotes on Karma

If you are familiar with Buddhist teachings, one thing you would know about them is how it all comes down to inner peace and surrendering everything. If you wish to live a fulfilled and happy life, here are some Buddha quotes on karma to motivate you.

Once you know the nature of anger and joy is empty and you let them go, you free yourself from karma. – Lord Buddha

To go from mortal to Buddha, you have to put an end to karma, nurture your awareness, and accept what life brings. – Lord Buddha

Even death is not to be feared by one who has lived wisely. – Lord Buddha

All that we are, is the result of what we have thought; what we think we become. – Lord Buddha

Everything is based on mind, is led by mind, is fashioned by mind. If you speak and act with a polluted mind, suffering will follow you, as the wheels of the oxcart follow the footsteps of the ox. – Lord Buddha

All that we are is the result of what we have thought. If a man speaks or acts with an evil thought, pain follows him. If a man speaks or acts with a pure thought, happiness follows him, like a shadow that never leaves him. – Lord Buddha

When action comes out of nothing it creates no karma. – Lord Buddha

Not even death can wipe out our good deeds. – Lord Buddha

Just as one can make a lot of garlands from a heap of flowers, so man, subject to birth and death as he is, should make himself a lot of good karma. – Lord Buddha

What you are is what you have been. What you’ll be is what you do now. – Lord Buddha

Karma Quotes in English

To end on a good note, here are some good karma quotes in english for you to inspire yourself every day.

When you carry out acts of kindness, you get a wonderful feeling inside. It is as though something inside your body responds and says, “Yes, this is how I ought to feel.'” – Harold Kushner

Remember to honor the hand which reached out for you when you needed it, by being that hand to someone else who is struggling. ― Greg Dutilly

If you truly loved yourself, you could never hurt another. – Buddha

Karma means you are the maker of your life. – Sadhguru

Everything we do is infused with the energy with which we do it. If we're frantic, life will be frantic. If we're peaceful, life will be peaceful. – Marianne Williamson

The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others. – Mahatma Gandhi

The energy you give off is the energy you receive. I really think that, so I'm always myself - jumping, dancing, singing around, trying to cheer everybody up. – Cara Delevingne

Karma means that through your thoughts and feelings and actions, you are generating a state of mind. That state of mind has a view. That view will cause things to happen to you or not happen to you. ― Frederick Lenz
